titleStmt.title: The mistakes, or, The false report a tragi-comedy, acted by their Majesties servants / written by Mr. Jos. Harris ; the prologue written by Mr. Dryden ; the epilogue by Mr. Tate.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Joseph, ca. 1650-ca. 1715.
Mountfort, William, 1664?-1692.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.

notesStmt.note: Epilogue with Dramatis personae on verso is bound at end, instead of after Prologue as catch word indicates.
Altered by Harris from a manuscript given him; Mountfort wrote a scene for the fifth act. Cf. Preface; Giles Jacob's English poets; BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
